reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major skeletal dysplasias per 100k births: achondroplasia (0.4), osteogenesis imperfecta (0.6), thanatophoric dysplasia (0.3), other lethal dysplasias (0.5), other non-lethal types (2.2) = ~4 per 100k births. Heterogeneous group of >400 distinct conditions.
